threepio.tagHandler
Class HandlerFactory

java.lang.Object
  threepio.tagHandler.HandlerFactory

public class HandlerFactory
extends java.lang.Object

HandlerFactory doles out Handlers to other classes.

Author:
jhoule

Field Summary
private  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class> handlerMap
          a map of the handlers availalbe to the Factory.
private  java.lang.Class[] handlers
          IMPORTANT: add any required handler class to this array! It's really not a bad idea to just have all TagHandler classes on this list.
 
Constructor Summary

          no-argument constructor.
 
Method Summary
 TagHandler getHandler(XTag t)

Field Detail

handlers

private java.lang.Class[] handlers
IMPORTANT: add any required handler class to this array! It's really not a bad idea to just have all TagHandler classes on this list. That way, the parser will have a full library of handlers.

handlerMap

private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Class> handlerMap
a map of the handlers availalbe to the Factory.

Constructor Detail

HandlerFactory

public HandlerFactory()
no-argument constructor. Sets up the Handler Map.

Method Detail

getHandler

public TagHandler getHandler(XTag t)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
returns a handler that is made to handle the tag passed.

Parameters:
t - - the tag
Returns:
the handler
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - when a handler cannot be found.
See Also:
